2023.chapter_name: Geographical Perspective on Selected Issues and Problems
2023.question: Write a short note on noise pollution.
2023.prashna: ध्वनि प्रदूषण पर एक संक्षिप्त टिप्पणी लिखिए।

2024.chapter_name: Geographical Perspective on Selected Issues and Problems
2024.question: Write a short note on water pollution.
2024.prashna: जल प्रदूषण पर एक संक्षिप्त टिप्पणी लिखिए ।
